Topic.Title: Hey I'm new. Could I get some advice?

Posts.EditableText: I need help doing some thing I just started the otherday and still figuring this out and one thing I'm trying to do is when you pick up an object or choose a choice you go to a new area could I please have some help
Posts.HTML: I need help doing some thing I just started the otherday and still figuring this out and one thing I'm trying to do is when you pick up an object or choose a choice you go to a new area could I please have some help

Posts.EditableText:
Clicking on the link "head out" will take you to the section called "Outside":

    [[Kitchen]]:
    You finish your lunch, and  [[head out]](Outside) to enjoy the day.

    [[Outside]]:
    The sun is shining.
